typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		last_trade_price as double,
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		CalendarDate as date,
		CalendarDatetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  * FROM [dbo].[Calendar]\nWHERE  CalendarDate = convert(date, getdate(), 1) ',
	format: 'query') ~> Calendar
source1 derive(timestamp = toDate(timestamp)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(timestamp),
	last_trade_price = mean(last_trade_price)) ~> Dailyprice
DerivedColumn1, Calendar join(timestamp == CalendarDate,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Dailyprice sink(input(
		Date_price as date,
		Last_trade_price as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Date_price = timestamp,
		Last_trade_price = last_trade_price
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
